aircraft.value: Skyhawk Fighter - AC-1053-134 at Training Center Beta

defect_observed.value: Hydraulic line vibration induced fatigue. Malfunction reported by flight crew.

root_cause.value: Improper calibration during last maintenance cycle

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Flight Control Hydraulics component. Inspection revealed damage to critical components.

corrective_action.value: Update software to latest certified version with bug fixes

remarks_investigation.value: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.

remarks_design.value: Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol. Date: 31/05/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Component inspection records verified. All quality parameters were within acceptable limits during manufacturing. Date: 01/06/2023 Signature: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User feedback incorporated. Recommend enhanced crew training on system operation and limitations. Date: 05/06/2023 Signature: Dr. A.K. Sharma

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality assurance framework assessed. Investigation process followed established protocols. Findings are valid. Date: 04/06/2023 Signature: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) From regulatory standpoint, investigation meets required standards. Approve proposed corrective actions. Date: 06/06/2023 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh

Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Major
b) Defect Observed: Hydraulic line vibration induced fatigue. Malfunction reported by flight crew.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Improper calibration during last maintenance cycle
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Flight Control Hydraulics component.
Inspection revealed damage to critical components.
c) Remedial Measures Update software to latest certified version with bug fixes
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Establish periodic calibration schedule
d) Attributable Code: F - Failure/ageing/Corrosion/Material Failure
Remarks: Complete defect...
